H0.text: The international network for banking communications is known by its acronym. IBAN

H1.text: The international network for banking communications is known by its acronym. SEPA

H2.text: The international network for banking communications is known by its acronym. BACS

H3.text: The international network for banking communications is known by its acronym. SWIFT

A4.text: The Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication (SWIFT) is a cooperative established in 1973 in Belgium

A5.text: SWIFT provides the main messaging network through which international payments are initiated
